articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Remembered by Bangladeshi Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Remembered by Bangladeshi Figures 
    Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Colorful functions were held in Chittagong, Bangladesh, on Mar. 9 and 10 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
 Displayed in the venues of the events were works of leader Kim Jong Il and photos on the theme of "Time-honored Mangyongdae".
 Participants of film shows watched Korean films dealing with the strong yearning and profound reverence of the Korean people and progressive mankind for President Kim Il Sung.    
 The secretary general of the Chittagong branch of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship Association and other speakers at a meeting recollected with deep emotion the immortal exploits performed by Kim Il Sung on behalf of the era and mankind, noting that he will always live in the hearts of the Korean people and progressive mankind.
 They renewed their determination to further strengthen the solidarity with the Korean people, expressing the conviction that the Korean people would register greater successes in their efforts to build a great prosperous powerful socialist nation and accomplish the cause of independence against imperialism under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Settlement of Issue of "Comfort Women" for Imperial Japanese Army Demanded
Japan's Preparations for Military Reinvasion Assailed
Struggle against Expansion of U.S. Military Base Supported in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle against Expansion of U.S. Military Base Supported in S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- The struggle of the residents in Phyongthaek and activists of the social organizations against the expansion of the U.S. military base in Phyongthaek is just. We, therefore, support their actions and will join them in their struggle.
 A joint assembly grouping more than 30 human rights organizations of south Korea declared this in a statement issued on Mar. 15 assailing the authorities for their moves to requisition land for the expansion of the U.S. military base in Phyongthaek.    With nothing can the authorities justify their anti-human rights moves to kill people for a war and a military purpose, it noted.    
 The statement vehemently condemned the "Ministry of National Defence" and the police for abusing the rights of the south Koreans for the sake of the "U.S-south Korea alliance".

articles.title: Greetings to Tunisian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Tunisian President 
    Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Sunday sent a message of greetings to Zine el Abidine Ben Ali, president of Tunisia, on the occasion of the 50th national day of his country. 
 The message sent warmest felicitations to the president, government and people of Tunisia.    
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger and develop in the future, the message wished the friendly people of Tunisia greater progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Tunisian Prime Minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Tunisian Prime Minister 
    Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a message of greetings to Mohamed Ghannouchi, prime minister of Tunisia, on the occasion of the 50th national day of Tunisia, the national holiday of its people. 
 The message wished him greater success in his work for the progress and prosperity of the country, expressing belief that the bonds of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger in the future.

articles.title: U.S. War Moves under Fire
Kim Jong Il Inspects Forward Commanding Post of KPA Unit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Forward Commanding Post of KPA Unit 
    Pyongyang, March 19 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, inspected the forward commanding post of KPA Unit 851.
 He climbed the forward commanding post on top of a height along a steep curved road to acquaint himself in detail with the terrain conditions and the deployment of forces and hear a report on the situation from the commander of the unit.
 He highly praised the service of the officers and men of the unit, satisfied to learn that they have turned all the operational theatres into an impregnable fortress with intense loyalty to the Party and the revolution and ardent patriotism and reliably defended the outpost of the country with a high degree of vigilance from the U.S. imperialists' moves for aggression. 
 Feasting his eyes on the defence line, he said that the revolutionary cause of Juche and the socialist homeland are sure to triumph as the defence line of the country is safeguarded by the dependable soldiers ready to annihilate the enemy with arms and firmly determined to make a long journey of revolution to the last with loyalty, single-mindedly following the WPK.    
 He watched the servicepersons in training. He set forth highly important tasks which would serve as the guidelines in strengthening the KPA into invincible revolutionary armed forces, expressing great satisfaction over the fact that all the soldiers have been fully prepared politically and ideologically and in military technique to beat back any surprise invasion by the enemy at one stroke and defend the socialist homeland as firm as an iron wall.    
 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun, member of the DPRK National Defence Commission and chief of the KPA General Staff, staff members of the KPA Supreme Command and KPA generals.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Commemorated in Italy
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Commemorated in Italy
    Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The Italian preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun was formed with due ceremony in Rome on Mar. 14.
 The inaugural ceremony elected the chairman of the Italian Committee for Friendship and Solidarity among the Peoples and Roberto Gabriele, general secretary of the Movement for Peace and Socialism of Italy, co-chairmen of the preparatory committee.
 The preparatory committee decided to organize colorful political functions including remembrance meeting, lecture, photo exhibition, film show and round-table talks on the occasion of the significant Day of the Sun.

articles.title: U.S. Nuclear-Powered Carrier to Be Involved in Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
U.S. Nuclear-Powered Carrier to Be Involved in Joint Military Exercises
    Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists announced that the nuclear-powered carrier "Abraham Lincoln" would be anchored in the East Sea of Korea during the entire period of the large-scale joint military exercises to be held across south Korea from Mar. 25, according to the south Korean KBS.
 This development brings to light the danger of the exercises to be launched by the U.S. imperialists soon and their real intention to ignite a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost.

articles.title: Anti-Dictatorship Struggle Recognized as Movement for Democratization in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-Dictatorship Struggle Recognized as Movement for Democratization in S. Korea
    Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean "inquiry committee for the reinstatement of those related to the pro-democracy movement and compensation to them" reportedly made a decision on Mar. 14 to recognize the actions against dictatorship staged by the members of the "National Liberation Movement of south Korea (Namminjon)" as a just movement for  democratization.
 In September 1979, military dictator Park Chung Hee fabricated the "case of Namminjon" by labeling it an "anti-state organization" and a "spy ring linked with the north" and punished its members on charges of violation of the ill-famed "Security Law". 
 Contending that the "case of Namminjon" was part of the democratization movement waged against the dictatorial rule of the Yusin system", the committee disclosed the injustice of the judgment of guilty meted out by the Park's military fascist regime to them at that time.    
 The committee said on the basis of the text of the then court decision and materials related to the case, it can judge they joined the Namminjon to conduct activities against "Yusin" in protest against dictator Park who destroyed the fundamental democratic order and infringed upon the basic rights of the people after wresting power through a military coup.

articles.title: Intl' Community Urged to Bring U.S. to Intl' Tribunal
Damage by Harmful Pine Insects on Increase in S. Korea
KPA's Spirit of Devoted Service for Country and People Lauded
Halt to Expansion of U.S. Military Base Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Halt to Expansion of U.S. Military Base Demanded in S. Korea
    Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- Members of the All-People Measure Committee for Checking the Expansion of the U.S. Military Base in Phyongthaek and "National Assemblymen" from ruling and opposition parties of south Korea reportedly called a news conference on March 10 to demand a halt to the expansion of the U.S. military base in Phyongthaek.
 A press release read out at the conference charged that land is being requisitioned for the expansion of the U.S military base despite the strong opposition of the residents in Phyongthaek to the forcible evacuation from there. It demanded an immediate halt to it. 
 The press release strongly demanded the authorities immediately open a hearing at the "National Assembly" over the issue of co-relation between the relocation of the U.S. military base and the realization of the "strategic flexibility" of its forces in south Korea and the humiliating nature of all sorts of agreements which oblige the south Korean side to cover the expenses for the relocation of the U.S. military base and the decontamination of polluted environment.

First National Sketch Festival Closes
Greetings to 8th Congress of LPRP
articles.content:
Greetings to 8th Congress of LPRP
    Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Saturday sent a message of greetings to the 8th Congress of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party.
 The message expressed the belief that the congress would be a turning occasion in the party activities for strengthening the unity of the whole party and all the people and propelling the building of independent and prosperous Laos.    
 Convinced that the friendly relations between the two parties and the two peoples would grow stronger as required by the times, the message wished the party congress success in its work.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves for China
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves for China
    Pyongyang, March 18 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Korea-China Friendship Association led by Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and concurrently vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Korea-China Friendship Association, left here Saturday by train to visit China.
